special_text:
[+1]: Reveal the top two cards of your library. An opponent chooses one and loses life equal to its mana value. Put that card into your graveyard and the other into your hand.
[-3]: Exile another target creature or planeswalker. You may cast it using mana of any type. If you don't, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “Once each turn, you may cast an Alice planeswalker spell from your hand or graveyard without paying its mana cost.”
